title: I started enjoying Brofrescos vids after this one thing...
body: I muted the video! I noticed that watching his gameplay is much more enjoyable after this. :) Try it out yourselves!! 10/10 players would recommend this new solution!

replies.body: He's a very average player with child like commentary, can't even stand his voice
Nah the lack of skill is still cancerous though at some times he can retain a hint of normality.
I heard that all of his games are custom. He invites friends that are Plat or above and everyone on the other team is low elo.
That is true when he has his summoner names turned off, but when he has them on they just duo/trio normals. Also all of his stream games are customs.
he's just an upper middle class white kid with no real friends, can't stand brofesco
